Headline: #75 74th-75th |Temporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/South Chicago
ShortDescription: Westbound  75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony island, 76th,  South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound  75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony island, 76th,  South Chicago and 75th: due to, street blockage near 75th/South Chicago.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
